main_definition: To inform or give notice to someone about something, typically through a formal communication.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Informing someone of an upcoming event or action that they need to be aware of.
meanings_and_examples.example: I will notify you when the meeting starts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To alert or make someone aware of a problem, issue, or situation.
meanings_and_examples.example: The bank notified us about the suspicious transaction on our account.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Informing others in advance about plans or intentions that may affect them.
meanings_and_examples.example: We need to notify all employees of the upcoming company-wide policy change.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To provide information through official channels, such as a legal document or formal letter.
meanings_and_examples.example: The landlord is required to notify tenants about changes in rent.
